name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.datanode.lock-reporting-threshold-ms
description:
When thread waits to obtain a lock, or a thread holds a lock for
    more than the threshold, a log message will be written. Note that
    dfs.lock.suppress.warning.interval ensures a single log message is
    emitted per interval for waiting threads and a single message for holding
    threads to avoid excessive logging.

name: hadoop.security.groups.cache.warn.after.ms
description:
If looking up a single user to group takes longer than this amount of
    milliseconds, we will log a warning message.

name: dfs.namenode.block.deletion.increment
description:
The number of block deletion increment.
      This setting will control the block increment deletion rate to
      ensure that other waiters on the lock can get in.

name: dfs.client.failover.max.attempts
description:
Expert only. The number of client failover attempts that should be
    made before the failover is considered failed.

name: dfs.namenode.delegation.token.max-lifetime
description:
The maximum lifetime in milliseconds for which a delegation 
      token is valid.

name: dfs.datanode.min.outlier.detection.nodes
description: Minimum number of nodes to run outlier detection.

name: io.map.index.skip
description:
Number of index entries to skip between each entry.
  Zero by default. Setting this to values larger than zero can
  facilitate opening large MapFiles using less memory.
